item.title: Showcase
item.description:
{{ range .Site.RegularPages }} {{ if eq .Section “posts” }} {{ .Title }}

  <!-- Show description if available or a truncated preview of the content -->
  <p>
    {{ if .Description }}
      {{ .Description }}
    {{ else }}
      {{ .Content | truncate 150 }}...
    {{ end }}
  </p>

  <a href="{{ .Permalink }}" class="read-more">Read More</a>
</div>

{{ end }} {{ end }}
item.content:
